userdoc.notice: B2 Token (B2T) Key properties: - Fixed supply: 21,000,000 B2T (18 decimals), minted to deployer at construction. - No tax (no tax wallet). - Transfer burn in basis points (bps). Example: 100 = 1.00%. Capped by MAX_BURN_BPS. - Fee exemptions for specific addresses (e.g., deployer, vault, founder, LP pair) to avoid burn on setup flows. - finalize(): permanently locks parameter changes (burn bps + fee exemptions). - Simple ownership (transfer/renounce). - Rescue function for non-B2T tokens accidentally sent to the contract.
